page.title: 12EGLOSHAYLE PLAYING FIELDS
page.content: By the river along Egloshayle Road are council owned{playing fields}. {TENNIS}There are 5 tennis courts ,3 special all weather courts and 2 asphalt. There is a thriving tennis club which runs many successful tournaments and provides coaching for beginners. {BOWLS}This club has about 105 members (75 men and 30 ladies). The season runs from the end of April to September. Teams play in the Cornwall Bowling League and the East Cornwall League. There are also many club competitions. {CRICKET}The teams play in Cornwall Senior League Div. 1(east) and in Junior League Div 2(east).Cornwall usually play one of their Minor County fixtures here in August.
